name: Choca-Diddle-Do
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

(there's a tutorial, but in case you forgot)

  • Space at the cash register to take a chicken's order
  • E to enter the caking making  station (at the table with a purple bowl)
    • 1 to put chocolate in the bowl, 2 to put strawberry, and 3 to put vanilla
  • E to exit cake making station
  • E at the oven to put the batter in (sometimes you have to press E aggressively to get it to work : | )
  • Q at oven to take the batter out
  • E to put in frier, Q to take out frier
  • Space at cash register to turn in order & get a new order
  • You're being timed!
  • Have fun :) 

I've never uploaded anything with unity. I noticed that the quality of my pixel art dropped drastically (maybe this happened when I compressed the file). Also no sound, sorry :D
